ygData.subject: Re: RebelYell tries to make contact.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... RebelYell looked at the ship and could not believe his optic sensors. He turned to Spears. No offense,but you dont actually expect that thing to ever fly

Message-ID: <20000814010629.23857.qmail@...>
Received: from [63.10.19.32] by web618.mail.yahoo.com; Sun, 13 Aug 2000 18:06:29 PDT
Date: Sun, 13 Aug 2000 18:06:29 -0700 (PDT)
Subject: Re: RebelYell tries to make contact.
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::RebelYell::
RebelYell looked at the ship and could not believe his
optic sensors. He turned to Spears. "No offense,but
you dont actually expect that thing to ever fly again
do you??"
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She stood up and looked at the newcomer. "I'm
> Spears. Pleased to meet 
> you. You can take your stuff down there to the other
> bots and help 
> with repairs.  We can use all the help we can get. 
> The pred on thier 
> last attack took a huge chunk out of our poor ship."
> She pointed down to Shadow Wing and Lunarpine.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > :RebelYell:
> > 
> >  RebelYell had been flying for several hours when
> off
> > in the distance he spotted a ship."Must be it" he
> > thought.As he got closer he saw a bot sitting at
> the
> > entrance.When he landed he dropped the parts he
> had
> > been carrying on the ground."I'm RebelYell," he
> said.
> > "Now could somebody tell me what the hell is goin'
> on
> > on this slaggin' rock??"
> > --- logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing/Spears::
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > She walked out of the ship and saw Spears
> sitting at
> > > the entrance 
> > > looking like she was deep in thought. "Hey, you
> OK?"
> > > 
> > > Spears::
> > > She turned with a little suprize. She relaxed
> and
> > > smiled,"Geez, you 
> > > startled me."  She chuckled, "yeah, I'm fine."
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > "OK, so what's on your mind? You looked like you
> > > were taking a trip 
> > > back to Cybertron." She said with half a
> chuckle.
> > > 
> > > Spears::
> > > "yeah, but not in this pile of rusted bolts.
> This
> > > ship is so damaged, 
> > > it wouldn'tfly again even if we replaced
> everything
> > > onboard down to 
> > > the paper clips in the captain's desk. The ark
> is
> > > grounded for good. 
> > > And all we can do is sit here and repair parts
> of it
> > > just enough to 
> > > survive another pred attack." She gave a deep
> sigh.
> > > 
> > > Shadow Wing::
> > > She put a comforting hand on Spears shoulder. 
> > > "Don't worry, 
> > > everything will work out.  You'll see." She
> smiled
> > > at Spears and 
> > > walked down the ramp.  She had another welding
> torch
> > > with her.  She 
> > > walked up to Lunarpine, "Hello beloved."  
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> >
